headline: Mizuho Raises Sherwin-Williams (SHW) Price Target to $410 after Earnings Review
summary: The Sherwin-Williams Company (NYSE:SHW) is included among the 16 Best Dividend Stocks with Rising Payouts. On February 17, Mizuho lifted its price recommendation on The Sherwin-Williams Company (NYSE:SHW) to $410 from $400. The firm reiterated its Outperform rating on the stock. The revision followed updates the firm made to its financial model after reviewing the […]
